Description: TasksResponsibilities:•Execute Interior development with supplier to secure the milestones in the project.•Prepare and monitor timeline for Interior development activities with supplier.•Collaboration with different cross-functional teams (Design, Purchasing, Quality, Production, Controlling) to meet quality, assembly & functional requirements.•Close coordination with supplier for functional development and product maturity.•Execution of Engineering Change requests as per project requirementsMandatory skills & experience:•03 – 08 years of relevant experience in automotive Interior design and development.•Product knowledge of automotive Interior including Plastic & Sheet metal parts.•Experience in full product lifecycle management spanning from concept generation, design & development, product validation (as per global regulation), product launch execution to post-production support.•Strong interpersonal skills to work effectively with suppliers and cross-functional teams.•Strong practitioner of basic engineering processes, analytical and problem-solving skills and with capability of out-of-the-box thinking.Additional skills & experience:•                    Working Experience in UG NX•German language•International work experience•Development experience in Mercedes-Benz or similar productsJob Details
